column4: why when i start my ubuntu today is the screen size 640*480? and  why when i try to change it is there no other option than that size?
<p99> yeah? ok because i got this just now when i started my computer
My suggestion would be to run dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and set it up that way. But I don't know what caused that problem.
